owner.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

repo.description: The name of the repository without the `.git` extension. The name is not case sensitive.

name.description: The name of the new runner.

runner_group_id.description: The ID of the runner group to register the runner to.

labels.description: The names of the custom labels to add to the runner. **Minimum items**: 1. **Maximum items**: 100.

work_folder.description: The working directory to be used for job execution, relative to the runner install directory.
